DOC.brief_summary: Limited evidence suggest acupuncture may help relieve symptom chronic prostatitis/chronic pelvic pain syndrome . This study evaluate acupuncture twice weekly 10 week would help ameliorate symptom CP/CPPS .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Acupuncture Relieve Symptoms Chronic Prostatitis
DOC.detailed_description: Various study report acupuncture able relieve symptom chronic prostatitis ( CP ) / chronic pelvic pain syndrome ( CPPS ) . However , controversy exists efficacy technique due poor experimental design lack placebo control experiment . This study first randomise control study evaluate acupuncture 10 week help improve symptom CP/CPPS
